name: docker-compose
description: My docker compose files for my home server
author: Paul DiLoreto <paul.diloreto@gmail.com>

scripts.pull: yarn network pull && yarn media pull && yarn backup pull && yarn hass pull && yarn wger pull
scripts.down: yarn network down && yarn media down && yarn backup down && yarn hass down && yarn wger down
scripts.upd: yarn network up -d && yarn media up -d && yarn backup up -d && yarn hass up -d && yarn wger up -d
scripts.update: yarn down && yarn pull && yarn upd
